title: Moving day logistics
context: You are helping a friend move from a small studio. Keep answers short and action-oriented.

cases.title: Morning checklist
cases.task: Create a morning-of moving checklist for a studio apartment.

cases.title: Elevator booking
cases.task: Plan steps to book and use a service elevator in a busy building.

cases.title: Key handoff
cases.task: Outline a key handoff plan between tenants and landlord on move-out day.

title: Packing strategy
context: Assume limited boxes and a two-day packing window. Provide pragmatic guidance.

cases.title: Fragile items
cases.task: Give a packing plan for fragile kitchenware with limited bubble wrap.

cases.title: Closet packing
cases.task: Suggest a fast way to pack a small closet without wrinkling clothes.

cases.title: Labeling system
cases.task: Design a simple labeling system for boxes to speed up unpacking.

title: Budget moving
context: Keep costs low. Assume no professional movers.

cases.title: Truck rental
cases.task: Compare options for renting a small truck on a weekend with a tight budget.

cases.title: DIY supplies
cases.task: List affordable packing supplies and where to source them quickly.

cases.title: Helper coordination
cases.task: Create a plan to recruit friends and offer low-cost incentives.

title: Family move
context: Moving a small family with a toddler. Prioritize safety and calm.

cases.title: Toddler day plan
cases.task: Outline a moving day plan that keeps a toddler safe and occupied.

cases.title: Priority boxes
cases.task: Define which boxes should be marked as first-open for a family move.

cases.title: Meal strategy
cases.task: Suggest a meal plan for moving day to reduce stress.

title: Remote coordination
context: The mover is remote and coordinating everything online.

cases.title: Remote checklist
cases.task: Build a remote-friendly checklist for coordinating movers and building access.

cases.title: Photo documentation
cases.task: Plan a photo documentation process to avoid disputes.

cases.title: Utility transfer
cases.task: Outline a remote process to transfer utilities between addresses.

title: Office move
context: Small startup office moving across town with minimal downtime.

cases.title: Equipment packing
cases.task: Provide a packing plan for office equipment and monitors.

cases.title: Downtime minimization
cases.task: Suggest a timeline to minimize downtime during a weekend office move.

cases.title: Inventory tracking
cases.task: Design a quick inventory tracking method for office assets.

title: International move
context: Moving internationally with customs considerations and longer timelines.

cases.title: Customs prep
cases.task: Create a customs preparation checklist for personal belongings.

cases.title: Shipping timeline
cases.task: Outline a shipping timeline and milestone plan for an overseas move.

cases.title: Temporary housing
cases.task: Suggest a plan for temporary housing while waiting on shipped goods.
